reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress fits beautifully, with one noting it hits just above the knees, and appreciate its flattering design that hugs the body. The dress is made of sports jersey-like material with fleece lining, making it perfect for cold evening events and fall/winter wear. They like its stretchiness, with one mentioning the gathered sides provide lots of flexibility, and consider it a great value. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lovely in lavender!
items.body: I love this long sleeve dress in the pretty lavender color! It's a simple dress, but it looks amazing and fits perfectly. It's so light-weight and feels very comfortable. Body shapers that I usually wear do show underneath this dress, but it isn't that distracting. Any form fitting dress is likely going to show the outline of most body shapers. I've worn this dress with some nice silky and shiny pantyhose and platform high heels for a night, and it made me feel delightfully feminine and sexy the entire time. Read more
items.author: Lenny S.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality, soft, and warm.
items.body: I bought this for a bachelorette party in March. It was a little chilly so I opted for long sleeves but still sexy little dress. Has a soft warm layer inside. I got purple heels that matched perfectly and overall felt so pretty in this dress! I got a small I’m 5’3, 120lbs and it fit true to size. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Bodycon For A Curvy Figure!
items.body: The media could not be loaded. I really loved the fit of this dress! I was surprised to see how well it fit on me with my curvy, plus- size 16/18 body. The length of the dress was really nice, I didn’t feel like I was too exposed. The material was much thicker than I expected almost like it’s double layered so it’s not sheer where it’s stretchy. It’s touchably soft and feels almost like sports jersey material, I love that it comes in so many colors!! The fit is so flattering and it’s incredibly comfortable, I would buy several more in the other color options! I normally wear a size 1x -2X in this type of garment this fit better than expected! Nothing uncomfortable about the fabric, love it all the way around! Read more
items.author: Tammy Viviano

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Love
items.body: Really cute dress and gives great shape Read more
items.author: Romina

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great dresss
items.body: I am six months pregnant and was looking for a stretchy dress. The gathered sides allow lots of stretch and adjustment in length. Like others said it is a nice thick material. I didn’t feel like it was skin tight or suffocating me. It looked more expensive than it is! Read more
items.author: Haley Humphry

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Versatile dress!
items.body: This was my first Amazon dress that I truly love wearing. I am 5'2 140 lb and the dress fits perfectly. The reusche style allows you to adjust the length of the skirt to your liking without it looking odd. The fabric is also lined with a warm fleece like texture, and it keeps me warm in New England weather. It hugs my body just right. I'm petite and sometimes it is difficult to find things that fit me proportionately, so this is a win! This dress would work for people taller than me too. It's not see through, the fabric has a good thickness. Overall very happy. Read more
items.author: Verified buyer

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars its okay
items.body: thick material and fleece inside but I just prefer my sleeves to be longer, good dress though! Read more
items.author: Kelsey

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very Flattering!
items.body: Love this dress, got soooo many compliments. It has a thin cotton liner attached to the inside so it's not super see through for being white. Actually very comfortable, nice material and super flattering. I couldn't get the wrinkles out after washing and the rouching makes it hard to iron, but my hand held streamer worked great. I'm 5'3" curvy and 165 lbs, bought a large and it fit perfect. Length was about mid thigh for me. Read more
items.author: Brooke

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Ruched Bodycon Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Ruched Bodycon Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Dark Green, Red, Wine Red, White, Purple, Royal Blue, Black, Coffee, Nude. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
